title: Li’l Gideon’s Big House!
description: From Gravity Falls Maximum Security Prison, Li’l Gideon is turning his life around by turning around the lives of those around him around.
quote: Open your heart to your feelings.
altHero: Li’l Gideon waves from behind prison visitation glass, wearing an orange jumpsuit and hairnet
alt1: Li’l Gideon leads a group session with other inmates
alt2: an inmate punches a pillow labeled “My issues”
alt3: Li’l Gideon poses for a painting, but the inmate is painting a flaming skull
alt4: through cracked glass, Li’l Gideon rides the shoulders of a very large inmate running as red lights flash
